com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice

Class AnnotatorBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.AnnotatorBundle

  • public class AnnotatorBundle
extends Object
    Class encapsulating the instantiation of an annotator bundle, and the execution on a single document.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AnnotatorBundle.RawAnnotationOutputRecord
      A wrapper class for annotation result of Low-level Java API result

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnnotatorBundle

        public AnnotatorBundle(AnnotatorBundleConfig cfg)
        Main constructor; sets the annotator configuration, but does not perform any initialization; actual initialization is done in init()
        Parameters:
        cfg - the annotator configuration

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws AnnotationServiceException
        Instantiate the annotator, based on the bundle configuration. This method caches the actual annotator object and reuses it across multiple invocations of invoke(JsonNode, ExecuteParams)
        Throws:
        AnnotationServiceException - if any exception was encountered during initializing the annotator bundle

      • invoke

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode invoke(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document,
                                                             ExecuteParams params)
        Execute the annotator bundle on a single document, with specified execution parameters.
        Parameters:
        document - the input document as a JSON record; the input document is ontology mapped; this method assumes the input record contains fields containing actual content, but also fields containing metadata (for example, to indicate the language or the content type of the document); this method does not validate that the record conforms to the ontology; instead, this method queries the input schema of the annotator and passes through to the annotator the values of the expected fields from the input document record; for example, in the case of a SystemT annotator, this method queries the schema of the view Document; if a field expected by the annotator does not exist in the input record, or the field exists but has an incompatible type, this method throws an exception; in the case of UIMA annotators, the current implementation assumes that the input document contains a field named AnnotationServiceConstants.DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME of type String and will throw an exception otherwise
        params - execution parameters for annotating the given input document
        Returns:
        a JSON record consisting of two fields named: AnnotationServiceConstants.ANNOTATIONS_FIELD_NAME and AnnotationServiceConstants.INSTRUMENTATION_INFO_FIELD_NAME, containing the output annotations, and instrumentation info, respectively; the value of the first field is a non-null JSON record with as many fields as output type names in the given annotator bundle config, where each element is a non-null JSON array (potentially empty) containing the annotator results of that type; the value of the second field is a non-null JSON record containing information about: input document size (in characters), running time (in milliseconds), number of annotations output, exception information (if any), whether the annotation was interrupted due to running time exceeding the given timeout, and whether the annotator completed successfully.

      • invokeRaw

        public AnnotatorBundle.RawAnnotationOutputRecord invokeRaw(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document,
                                                           ExecuteParams params)
        Execute the annotator bundle on a single document, with specified execution parameters.
        Parameters:
        document - the input document as a JSON record; the input document is ontology mapped; this method assumes the input record contains fields containing actual content, but also fields containing metadata (for example, to indicate the language or the content type of the document); this method does not validate that the record conforms to the ontology; instead, this method queries the input schema of the annotator and passes through to the annotator the values of the expected fields from the input document record; for example, in the case of a SystemT annotator, this method queries the schema of the view Document; if a field expected by the annotator does not exist in the input record, or the field exists but has an incompatible type, this method throws an exception; in the case of UIMA annotators, the current implementation assumes that the input document contains a field named AnnotationServiceConstants.DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME of type String and will throw an exception otherwise
        params - execution parameters for annotating the given input document
        Returns:
        a raw annotation output record consisting of two fields named: AnnotationServiceConstants.ANNOTATIONS_FIELD_NAME and AnnotationServiceConstants.INSTRUMENTATION_INFO_FIELD_NAME, containing the output annotations, and instrumentation info, respectively; the value of the first field is a map from fields as output type name in the given annotator bundle config to TupleList which containing the annotator results of that type; the value of the second field is a non-null JSON record containing information about: input document size (in characters), running time (in milliseconds), number of annotations output, exception information (if any), whether the annotation was interrupted due to running time exceeding the given timeout, and whether the annotator completed successfully.

      • getOutputSchema

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jsonSchema.types.ObjectSchema getOutputSchema(List<String> inputSchema)

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
               throws AnnotationServiceException
        Terminate the annotator bundle and release the resource
        Throws:
        AnnotationServiceException

      • makeOutputRecord

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode makeOutputRecord(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document,
                                                                              com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode annotations,
                                                                              com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode errors,
                                                                              long elapsedTimeMS,
                                                                              InterruptResponse interruptResponse,
                                                                              AnnotatorBundleConfig annotatorBundleCfg)
        Put together the output of invoke(JsonNode, ExecuteParams) and the instrumentation info into a single record.
        Parameters:
        document - input document, as a JSON record
        annotations - JSON record containing the output of the annotator
        errors - JSON Record containing the error message and stack trace, if any error was encountered during the annotation of the given input document; null otherwise
        elapsedTimeMS - run time (in milliseconds) of the annotator on the input document
        interruptResponse - token object indicating whether the annotator execution was interrupted on the input document due to timeout
        annotatorBundleCfg - annotator bundle configuration (potentially null) of the annotator bundle that created the output
        Returns:
        a JSON record consisting of two fields: 'annotations' and 'instrumentationInfo', containing the output annotations, and instrumentation info, respectively

      • makeRawOutputRecord

        public static AnnotatorBundle.RawAnnotationOutputRecord makeRawOutputRecord(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document,
                                                                            Map<String,com.ibm.avatar.algebra.datamodel.TupleList> annotations,
                                                                            com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode errors,
                                                                            long elapsedTimeMS,
                                                                            InterruptResponse interruptResponse,
                                                                            AnnotatorBundleConfig annotatorBundleCfg)
        Put together the output of invokeRaw(JsonNode, ExecuteParams) and the instrumentation info into a single record.
        Parameters:
        document - input document, as a JSON record
        annotations - A raw record containing the output of the annotator
        errors - JSON Record containing the error message and stack trace, if any error was encountered during the annotation of the given input document; null otherwise
        elapsedTimeMS - run time (in milliseconds) of the annotator on the input document
        interruptResponse - token object indicating whether the annotator execution was interrupted on the input document due to timeout
        annotatorBundleCfg - annotator bundle configuration (potentially null) of the annotator bundle that created the output
        Returns:
        a raw record consisting of two fields: 'annotations' and 'instrumentationInfo', containing the output annotations, and instrumentation info, respectively
